channel.title: Objects on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Objects on ZooBerry

item.title: Aquatic Adventure Pack
item.description: Aquatic Adventure Pack featuring paths, gazebos, restaurants, and more.

item.title: Christmas Scenery Pack
item.description: Christmas Scenery Pack featuring fountains, gazebos, and more.

item.title: Halloween Scenery Pack
item.description: Halloween Scenery Pack with paths, canopies, and more.

item.title: Japanese Mini Pack
item.description: A Japanese-themed pack with paths and objects for your zoo.

item.title: Objects
item.description: Any inanimate objects including buildings, fences, paths, animal enrichment items, etc.

item.title: Purple Pack
item.description: A purple-themed pack with various decorative objects.

item.title: Snow Tiger Easter Contest Pack 1
item.description: Snow Tigers Easter Contest Pack 1 with Easter-themed objects.

item.title: Snow Tiger Easter Pack 2
item.description: Snow Tigers Easter Contest Pack 2 with Easter-themed objects and animals.

item.title: Snow Tigers Special Theme Pack
item.description: Snow Tigers Special Theme Pack with paths, fences, and more.

item.title: Theme Packs
item.description: Bundles of objects all curated or designed after a specific theme.

item.title: Blue Fence
item.description: A lovely blue fence to match the blue path.

item.description: A bar-style fence for zoos.

item.description: A dragon-themed wall for zoos.

item.description: Fence in your animals with these decorative and functional fences!

item.description: A galaxy-themed wall for zoos.

item.description: Frame your paths and exhibits with these decorative arches!

item.description: Objects that are designed to just sit there and look pretty!

item.description: An elevated sky path for your zoo.

item.description: A Spiderweb Gazebo for your spooky Halloween zoo.

item.description: A starry elevated path for exhibits.

item.description: A water jet for decorative purposes.

item.description: A St. Patty’s Day path.

item.title: Zootilities
item.description: Zootilies are visitor services, accessibility, lighting, waste management, or informational items for your guests.

item.description: A decorative arch for your zoo.

item.description: An Alpine Cat Climber for alpine-based cats.

item.description: A Halloween-themed fence.

item.description: An invisible fence for exhibits.

item.title: Jungle Ruins Cat Climber
item.description: A Jungle Ruins Cat Climber for Tropical Rainforest cats.

item.title: Shelters
item.description: Shelters to keep your animals safe and happy!

item.title: Snowy Cat Climber
item.description: A snowy Cat Climber for snow-bound cats.

item.title: Cotton Candy Bench
item.description: A very pink bench designed to look like cotton candy.

item.title: Inlaid Stone Picnic Table
item.description: A classic-looking picnic table for your guests.

item.title: Jungle Bench
item.description: Jungle-themed benches to let your guests rest.

item.title: Paw Prints Bench
item.description: A cute bench covered in paw prints, part of a matching set.

item.title: Paw Prints Trashcan
item.description: A cute trashcan covered in paw prints, part of a matching set.

item.title: T'ni's Halloween Path Pack
item.description: A spooky Halloween-themed path collection created by T’ni.

item.title: Tiger Bench
item.description: A wild tiger-patterned bench to spice up your zoo.

item.title: Unleashed Bench
item.description: A bench made to celebrate ZTUF.

item.title: Zebra Picnic Table
item.description: A zebra-themed picnic table for your zoo.

item.title: Zebra Trashcan
item.description: A zebra-themed trashcan for your zoo.

item.title: Zebra Viewing Canopy
item.description: A zebra-themed viewing canopy for your zoo.

item.title: Iron Tunnel
item.description: This dinosaur fence is perfect for large dinosaurs. There are also two smaller dinosaur fences, a vehicle gate and placeable cables. With these objects you can make a gate construction for Jeeps or zookeepers.

item.title: Bear Sculpture
item.description: A bear sculpture imported from WLP2 by Platypus.

item.title: Sugar Starfish
item.description: A sugar starfish with 3 variant skins.

item.title: Sword Ferns
item.description: Sword Ferns are evergreen ferns native to western North America.

item.title: SZE Log Fences and Branches Mini-Pack
item.description: A mini-pack of log fences and branches for Zoo Tycoon 2.

item.title: Building Kits
item.description: Building Kits are sets of objects that can be used to create custom buildings in Zoo Tycoon 2.

item.title: SZE Big Glass Aviary
item.description: A building kit that lets you build a glass Aviary.

item.title: Animal Food
item.description: Animal enrichment, food, and shelters to keep your animals fed and happy!

item.title: Rack of Ribs
item.description: A rack of ribs food enrichment item for Zoo Tycoon 2.

item.title: Peach Railing Fence
item.description: Originally released as a teaser for The CRG Problem’s upcoming Barn Pack.

item.title: Hanging Whale Skeleton
item.description: This download adds a decorative hanging whale skeleton to your Zoo Tycoon 2 game.

item.title: Placeable Hay
item.description: Placeable hay made by The CRG Problem.

item.title: One Ocean Whale Tail Statue
item.description: A show backdrop for your killer whale shows!

item.title: Falling Snow
item.description: An emitter that creates falling snow and functions as a tour item.

item.title: Sea Predator Path
item.description: This path is part of the Predators of the Seas Expanion Pack, and was the first non-animal and non-biome item created for it.

item.title: Steppe Grass
item.description: This green Tall Steppe Grass is Tall Steppe, and your animals love to hide in it. Place it all over your zoo for decoration!

item.title: Deep-Sea Anemone and Brown Algae
item.description: A deep-sea anemone and brown algae made by Fauna.

item.title: SZE Carnivore House
item.description: Summary of the Sze Carnivore House project

item.title: SZE Basic Pack
item.description: Basic Pack by SZE was a an assortment of resource files that serve as a basis for SZE’s other mods.

item.title: Africa Sign Pack 3
item.description: A set of information signs for the Africa theme. These will be found purchasable from the Scenery tab in-game.

item.title: Africa Sign Pack 2
item.description: A set of information signs for the Africa theme. These will be found purchasable from the Scenery tab in-game.

item.title: Africa Sign Pack 1
item.description: A set of information signs for the Africa theme. These will be found purchasable from the Scenery tab in-game.

item.title: Nocturnal Pack
item.description: A pack of nocturnal-themed objects by Feral Designs.

item.title: Tank Panels
item.description: Tank Panels by Thom.

item.title: Indoor Fences
item.description: Indoor Fence made by Felipeepilef.

item.title: Green Fence
item.description: Green Fence made by Felipeepilef.

item.title: Japanese Macaque Donation Box
item.description: A donation box box designed to look like a Japanese Macaque.

item.title: Endangered Picnic Table
item.description: An endangered-themed picnic table.

item.title: Massai Fence
item.description: A massai fence for your zoo!

item.title: Stony Fence
item.description: A stony fence for your zoo!

item.title: Binoculars Pack
item.description: This pack contains four binoculars.

item.title: Elements Pack
item.description: This is a scenery pack from the creative minds of Penguinman and Budgielover101.

item.title: Afromontane Foliage
item.description: A set of trees from African mountains made to accompany the user-made Montane Forest biome!

item.title: Wax Palm
item.description: The wax palm (Palma de cera del quindio in Spanish) is not only the tallest palm, but the tallest monocot in the world.

item.title: Arabian Nights Location Banners
item.description: A set of banners with locations featured in Artifex’s Arabian Nights user-made expansion pack.

item.title: Crumbling Dark Brick Pack
item.description: Dark crumbling bricks are a perfect path for Halloween themed areas of your zoos. Original skin by genkicoll for ZT1, converted to ZT2 by ShenTirag.

item.title: Extinct Animal Crossing Signs
item.description: A set of nine extinct animal crossing signs that warn visitors on foot or in jeep transports that various extinct animals from around the world may cross their path.

item.title: Genkicoll's ZT1 Paths for ZT2 Pack
item.description: A selection of genkicoll’s wonderful paths that she has made for ZT1, replicated with permission for use in ZT2. Enjoy wooden, sandstone, shadowstone and other paths in your zoos!

item.title: Island Excursions Location Banners
item.description: A set of banners with locations featured in Artifex’s Arabian Nights user-made expansion pack.

item.title: Leafy Path
item.description: A path covered in newly fallen leaves, featuring leaf decorations along the curb as well. Perfect for a walk through temperate forests!

item.title: Natural Scenery Pack 1
item.description: The first of two sets aimed towards creating more realistic zoos, and my first ever user-made pack for Zoo Tycoon 2! Featuring three paths (two bark chip and one stone path), two topiaries and a bench.

item.title: Natural Scenery Pack 2
item.description: A second set of natural wooden scenery to soften the curves of a harsh city zoo. Featuring a mahogany wooden donation box, binocular set, viewing canopy and map, alongside a set of ivy covered arches including large sizes to cover wide paths. Additionally, several fallen logs are contained to give a realistic feel to a forest exhibit.

item.title: Rusty Fences
item.description: A pair of rusting metal fences, complete with chains and portholes! Perfect for placing alongside benthic animals!

item.title: Warning Signs
item.description: This small pack contains signs containing warnings and instructions to abide when visiting the zoo. It includes No Entry and Staff Only, signs reminding guests to not tap the glass or feed the animals, prohibiting flash photography, reminding guests to wash their hands and other useful signs for zoos and safari parks.

item.title: Desert Themed Elevated Path
item.description: Part of a set of elevated paths made to match the vanilla game’s building themes, in this case the Desert Theme from African Adventure.

item.title: Endangered Species Themed Elevated Path
item.description: Part of a set of elevated paths made to match the vanilla game’s building themes, in this case the Endangered Theme from Endangered Species.

item.title: Extinct Themed Elevated Path
item.description: Part of a set of elevated paths made to match the vanilla game’s building themes, in this case the Extinct Theme from Extinct Animals.

item.title: Jungle Themed Elevated Path
item.description: Part of a set of elevated paths made to match the vanilla game’s building themes, in this case the Jungle Theme from base Zoo Tycoon 2.

item.title: Safari Themed Elevated Path
item.description: Part of a set of elevated paths made to match the vanilla game’s building themes, in this case the Safari Theme from base Zoo Tycoon 2.

item.title: Tundra Themed Elevated Path
item.description: Part of a set of elevated paths made to match the vanilla game’s building themes, in this case the Tundra Theme from official bonus downloads.

item.title: Indian Mango Tree
item.description: An Asian fruit tree. This beautiful mango variety lives in the Indian scrublands.

item.title: Tamarind Tree
item.description: This wonderful tree will be great in Scrub and Tropical Rainforest exhibits with animals from Asia, Africa or Central America..

item.title: Animal Bench Pack
item.description: A pack containing many benches which you can select from.

item.title: Giant Volcano
item.description: This large volcano adds some spectacular scenery to tours though the zoo.

item.title: Ibex Statue
item.description: An ibex statue for your guests to look at.

item.title: Penguin Fountain
item.description: This penguin fountain will illuminate your penguin exhibits when guests pass by to view these little cuddly creatures.

item.title: Tree Elevated Path Pack
item.description: This pack contains 9 elevated paths, each made to resemble a tree from a different biome.

item.title: ZT2DC Gazebo
item.description: This download was created as a collaboration between many members for the first Skinning Collage Event at ZT2DC.

item.title: Jurrasic Bench
item.description: This bench will go perfectly alongside your Jurassic period species.

item.title: Lemur Donation Box
item.description: This donation box has a lemur instead of a monkey as well as the animals from Madagascar, the movie.

item.title: Mini Volcano
item.description: Guests will love this mini form of the volcano, especially when it is erupting steam.

item.title: Stone Table
item.description: A table made of stone for guests to eat on.

item.title: Zoo History Board
item.description: A board which shows the history of the zoo for guests to see.

item.title: Animal Crossing Signs
item.description: A set of sixteen animal crossing signs that warn visitors on foot or in jeep transports that various animals from around the world may cross their path.

item.title: Topiary Pack
item.description: This pack contains topiary versions of the lion, tiger and elephant fountains, as well as a matching low shrub hedge.

item.title: Pig Donation Box
item.description: A donation box that has a pig on it.

item.title: Presently-Seated Bench
item.description: Download the Presently Seated Bench, a festive holiday bench

item.title: Buildings
item.description: Functional buildings such as food stands, carts, restaurants, etc.

item.title: Churro Stand
item.description: Churros are a fun Mexican pastry with lots of sugar!

item.title: Stainless Steel Table
item.description: A stainless steel table made by Taz Little Monster.

item.title: Green and Gothic Lamps
item.description: These old fashioned lamps, look elegant, and pitch-perfect with the old timey zoos.

item.title: La Torre del Oro
item.description: Imported by Josito, Model and skin from Luna.

item.title: Winter Forest Sign
item.description: A decorative sign that is weathered by winter’s harshness and winter’s beauty; it comes in three variants and matches well with winter scenes.

item.title: World of Imports P2
item.description: Imported models prepared by Slice. Pack 2 of 3.

item.title: World of Imports P1
item.description: Imported models prepared by Slice. Pack 1 of 3.

item.title: White Salt Fence
item.description: White salt fence made by Robert.

item.title: Rhino Statue
item.description: A rhino statue made by Rhino Designs.

item.title: Restroom Sign Pack
item.description: These are signs to go on fences to symbolise it being a restroom door.

item.title: Alpine Viewing Area
item.description: The Alpine Viewing Area was designed by Zooasaurus

item.title: Alpine Geological Model
item.description: Designed by Otter Lord

item.title: Markhor Fountain
item.description: The markhor fountain was designed by King Hoopla

item.title: Forgotten Spire
item.description: The Forgotten Spire was designed by Catc for the 2008 Coliseum Tournament.

item.title: Ibex Arch
item.description: Ibex arch designed by badisbadis101.hugo

item.title: Atlantis Viewing Area
item.description: An Atlantis-themed viewing canopy.

item.title: Enlarged Desert Fountain
item.description: This fountain is a larger version of the one found in AA.

item.title: Snow Volcano
item.description: A volcano with a snowy peak.

item.title: Small Gemstone Pack
item.description: A pack of 8 gemstone deposits.

item.title: Shen's Path Pack
item.description: A pack with 12 new paths!

item.title: Glass Fence
item.description: This is the an all glass fence created by Gibbon-Fanatic with help from Penguinman. Enjoy!

item.title: Shen's Fences Pack
item.description: 10 new fences!

item.title: Sandstone Theme
item.description: The Sandstone Theme Pack contains items made of softly coloured sandstone, often overgrown with ivy.

item.title: Aboriginal Australian Pack
item.description: Includes a high and low fence, an arch, a path, and a kangaroo statue.

item.title: EA Foliage Expansion Pack
item.description: An EA foliage expansion pack by ShenTirag.

item.title: Coastal Theme Pack
item.description: A coastal theme pack by ShenTirag.

item.title: Water Springs Fountain
item.description: A beautiful fountain.

item.title: Mystery Meat Carcass
item.description: A carcass with a mysterious green meat inside.

item.title: Meat in a Wooden Trough
item.description: A wooden trough with red meat in it.

item.title: Jungle Croc Trashcan
item.description: A jungle-themed trashcan with a croc head on it.

item.title: Insect Dish
item.description: This is a dish containing insects to be eaten from by insectivores.

item.title: Grizzly Bear Statue
item.description: A statue dedicated for the grizzly bear!

item.title: Giant Bamboo
item.description: This is a larger version of the water bamboo to create bamboo forests.

item.title: Large Kelp Forest
item.description: This is a large version of the kelp forest available in MM2.

item.title: Duckweed, Square
item.description: This plant floats on the water.

item.title: Duckweed, Round
item.description: This plant floats on the water.

item.title: Colored Path Pack
item.description: This pack contains 14 wonderful colors of path to add a delightful touch to your zoo.

item.title: Cactus Donation Box
item.description: A donation box with a cactus in it.

item.title: Zoomania Path
item.description: This path was designed for the ZooMania 100 Member Celebration Party.

item.title: Waterfall Fountain
item.description: A soothing waterfall perfect for wetlands or tropical rainforest areas in your zoos.

item.title: South American Trashcan
item.description: We made this trashcan a while ago. We hope that you all enjoy it.

item.title: Mystery Meat Trough
item.description: A trough with green meat in it.

item.title: Mystery Meat Dish
item.description: A dish with the green meat inside.

item.title: Mini Trashcan Pack
item.description: In this pack, you will find a Royal Trascan, Marble Trashcan, and a Wooden Trashcan.

item.title: Mahogany Bench
item.description: A dark wooden bench great for any rest stop or viewing area.

item.title: Lighthouse
item.description: The Lighthouse was made from the Lighthouse Gazebo.

item.title: Large Safari Fountain
item.description: This is a large version of the savannah themed fountain

item.title: Biome Shelter Pack
item.description: Tired of shelters that just don’t match your beautifully crafted exhibits? Worry no more! This pack contains shelters created to complement your exhibits: Boreal Forest Rock Cave, Temperate Forest Rock Cave, Grassland Rock Cave, Savannah Rock Cave, Wetlands Rock Cave, Grassland burrows for Ratels, and a tropical fern Shade Structure.

item.title: Animal Enrichment
item.description: Animal enrichment, food, and shelters to keep your animals fed and happy!
